extension.searchTitle: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 963, FORCED ARBITRATION INJUSTICE REPEAL ACT OF 2022, AND PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 2116, CREATING A RESPECTFUL AND OPEN WORLD FOR NATURAL HAIR ACT OF...; Congressional Record Vol. 168, No. 47

congVote.result: So the previous question was ordered.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Forced Arbitration Injustice Repeal Act and Creating a Respectful and Open World for Natural Hair Act_Rule for Consideration
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to H. Res. 979, providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 963) to amend title 9 of the United States Code with respect to arbitration, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2116) to prohibit discrimination based on an individual's texture or style of hair, by a yea-and-nay vote of 219 yeas to 207 nays, Roll No. 74, after the previous question was ordered by a yea-and-nay vote of 219 yeas to 204 nays, Roll No. 73.

congVote.result: So the resolution was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Forced Arbitration Injustice Repeal Act and Creating a Respectful and Open World for Natural Hair Act_Rule for Consideration
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to H. Res. 979, providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 963) to amend title 9 of the United States Code with respect to arbitration, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2116) to prohibit discrimination based on an individual's texture or style of hair, by a yea-and-nay vote of 219 yeas to 207 nays, Roll No. 74, after the previous question was ordered by a yea-and-nay vote of 219 yeas to 204 nays, Roll No. 73.
